import './App.css'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Nav from './components/nav' import About from './components/about' import Card from './components/card' import Avatar from './components/avatar' import SocialMediaIcons from './components/socialMediaIcons' import WhatIDo from './components/whatIDo' import PortfolioText from './components/portfolioText'; import PortfolioProjects from './components/portfolioProjects' import hashtag from '../src/imgs/whatIdoIcons/hashtag.png' import papers from '../src/imgs/whatIdoIcons/papers.png' import star from '../src/imgs/whatIdoIcons/star.png' import Aos from 'aos' import "aos/dist/aos.css" function App() { const [darkMode, setDarkMode] = useState(true); useEffect(()=>{ Aos.init({duration:2000}); }, []); const swtichbgMode = () =>{ console.log(darkMode) setDarkMode(!darkMode) } return (

); } export default App;
